column25: This appropriation is intended to cover accident insurance and reimbursement of medical expenses for Members and loss and theft of Members’ personal effects.
column26: It is also intended to cover the provision of insurance cover and assistance to Members should they need to be repatriated whilst undertaking an official journey
column27: as a result of a serious illness
column28: an accident or an unforeseen event that prevents them from continuing their journey. Such assistance involves organising the Member’s repatriation and defraying the related costs.
column29: The amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(3) of the Financial Regulation is estimated at EUR 140 000.
